subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: <check><on-true>Subscribing to this course adds it to your course list.</on-true><on-false>Subscribing to this course adds it to your course list. By subscribing, you grant permission to the (current and future) teachers of this course to view your progress within the course. You can always undo this by unsubscribing from the course.</on-false></check>

teachers.title: Teachers
teachers.description: <count-check><zero>This course has no teachers at the moment.</zero><not-zero>This course is taught by <word-list/>.</not-zero></count-check>

learningGoals.title: Learning goals
learningGoals.description: The course has the following final <count-check><one>goal</one><not-one>goals</not-one></count-check>.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.description: <check><on-true>Unsubscribing from this course removes it from your course list. You can always resubscribe.</on-true><on-false>Unsubscribing from this course removes it from your course list. It also revokes permissions for the teachers of this course to view your progress within the course. You can always resubscribe to the course.</on-false></check>

studentView.title: Student view
studentView.description: In the student view you can see the course as if you are a student.
studentView.label: Student view active
studentView.note: As a teacher, you also get the "Insert solution" button at exercises. Students don't have it!

addTeacher.label: Add a teacher
addTeacher.note: Adding a teacher will grant them access to the work and progress of all students within this course.

unsubscribe.title: Unsubscribe
unsubscribe.description: <check><on-true>By removing yourself from this course, you revoke your teacher access.</on-true><on-false>You are a student in this course, but you see this teacher page due to your admin rights. You can unsubscribe as a student from this course.</on-false></check>

adminSubscribe.title: Subscribe
adminSubscribe.description: You're currently not a part of this course, but you are using your admin rights to peek in. Want to formally subscribe? Do so here.
